title: Unnai Kandane Mudhal Murai Lyrics Parijatham
stanzas:
Unnai Kandane Mudhal Murai Song Lyrics Parijatham
#DharanKumar #Haricharan

unnai kandane
muthal murai
naan ennai thulaithene
muttrilumai thaan

kaathal bhoothamey
ennai neeyum thottai
hayyo hayayo.
achcham varuthey
thappichellave valigal
illai inge
hayyo hayayo..
chee enavo panninaai neeye

unnai kandane
muthal murai
naan ennai thulaithene
muttrilumai thaan

Erikkira mazhai idhu
kulirgira veyil idhu
kothikira neer idhu
anaikira thee idhu
inikira vali idhu
iruamuzha poo idhu
ithayathil malarvadhu
o penne

nijamulle poi idhu
niramulle iruttidhu
mounathin mozhi idhu
maranathin vaazh idhu
andharathin kadal idhu
kanthirantha kanavidhu
ahimsayil kovadhu
kaezh penne

enginen naan thenginen
yenada podhum imsaigal
vaanamum intha bhoomiyum
unthan thotrame
un per sonaale
ulle thithukkume

kaathal kaditham
adhu konjam pesum
kannodu irukkum
pala kaditham

penne naanum
un kannai padipen
puriyamal thavithen
poi sollutho
meyi sollutho

o kaathal enai
thaakiduthey
seri thaan enayum
adhu saayithiduthe

iravil kanavum
ennai saapiduthe
pothuvaai vayathil
idhil thappikke
yaarum illaiye
unnai kandene ..

eno iravil oru
padal kaettaal
udane yen ulle
nee varuvaai

koyil ulle
kan mudi nindraai
un uruvam thaane
enaalumenenjil thondrume

naan unaalthaan
swasikiren
naan unper
dhinam vaasikiren

uyirai vidavum
unai nesikiren
kadavul nilayai
namm kannile
kaattidum kaathal

unnai kandane
muthal murai
naan ennai thulaithene
muttrilumai thaan

kaathal bhoothamey
ennai neeyum thottai
hayyo hayayo.
achcham varuthey
thappichellave valigal
illai inge
hayyo hayayo..
chee enavo panninaai neeye

Erikkira mazhai idhu
kulirgira veyil idhu
kothikira neer idhu
anaikira thee idhu
inikira vali idhu
iruamuzha poo idhu
ithayathil malarvadhu
o penne

nijamulle poi idhu
niramulle iruttidhu
mounathin mozhi idhu
maranathin vaazh idhu
andharathin kadal idhu
kanthirantha kanavidhu
ahimsayil kovadhu
kaezh penne

enginen naan thaenginen
yenada podhum imsaigal
vaanamum intha bhoomiyum
unthan thotrame
un per sonaale
ulle thithukkume

maanasukull yedho sol sol
edhirinil vandhu nill nill
uyirukkul yedho jal jal
idhu sarithaanaa nee sol
